summary:
Devops / Openshift consultant:
- Creating workshops for developers to onboard onto Openshift
- Hands-on consultancy for Developers to get acquainted with Openshift
- Developing best practices for developers to use
- Participating in a Devops transition committee

Consultant in Kubernetes:
- Designing our new Learning platform
- Writing Terraform plans to deploy into GCP
- Designing and implementing containers for our Lab environment

Consultant in Kubernetes:
- Writing migration plans to migrate to Cilium
- Rewriting Helm Charts
- Containerising applications

Consultant in Kubernetes:
- Desigining Kubernetes clusters
- Deploying Kubernetes clusters
- Containerising applications
- Creating usable Gitops Structures
- Deploying Observability based on Prometheus
- Deploying ArgoCD instance for both development and production

Consultant in Automation:
- Redhat Enterprise Linux 7 / 8
- Ansible
- Redhat Satellite
- Ansible Tower
- Gitlab

- Redhat Enterprise Linux 7 / 8
- Ansible
- Redhat Satellite
- Ansible Tower

- Kubernetes
- OpenShift

- Ansible

- Gitlab

Managing serveral things:

Managing firewalls and implementing Mobile Device Management solutions
